Arsenal are preparing a £54m (€60m) bid for Monaco winger Thomas Lemar but face new competition from Barcelona, Manchester City and Liverpool, according to reports.

Arsene Wenger has made no secret of his pursuit of Lemar, however Monaco continue to insist that the France international is not for sale this summer.


The Gunners have already had two bids rejected, but may now need to move quickly with Barcelona making their interest clear.

According to French newspaper L'Equipe, the Catalan club are eyeing Lemar as a potential replacement for Neymar, who completed his world-record transfer to Paris Saint-Germain this week.

古天奴

【now.com體育】巴塞隆拿周五在尼馬轉投巴黎聖日耳門後首次征戰，在落後1球情況下，由柏高艾卡沙於末段扳平1:1，不致老貓燒鬚，逼和西乙球會塔拉戈納。

巴塞隆拿周五作客友戰塔拉戈納，由於這場比賽是巴塞自尼馬出「塞」投巴黎聖日耳門後的首次出征，教練華維迪在這場收起了不少主力球員，恩尼斯達、美斯、碧基和蘇亞雷斯均沒有上陣，開賽僅11分鐘，塔拉戈納前鋒巴里路接應左路妙傳建功射成1:0，為主場球迷送上驚喜，巴塞在失了這記入球後，更有中堅華美倫因左腳傷退下火線，可說禍不單行。

戰至下半場，巴塞分別換入迪路菲奧、安祖高美斯、佐迪艾巴和杜格拉斯彭利拿等球員希望挽回劣勢，然而，除了迪路菲奧一記射門差點為巴塞扳平外，地上最強還是顯得束手無策，幸好，柏高艾卡沙完場前11分鐘以一記30碼遠射，為巴塞打破僵局追成1:1，最終和氣收場，不致敗興。

及至周末早上的操練，一眾周五未有落場的戰將都參與其中，華美倫卻未能參與，暫未知其傷勢。巴塞將於周日早上再操練，備戰周一對查比高恩斯的甘柏盃。

Everton interested in move for Danny Welbeck

Everton are being linked with a £30m move for Arsenal striker Danny Welbeck if they can’t do a deal for Olivier Giroud according to the Mirror.

The 26 year old Arsenal forward has suffered a torrid time with injuries having suffered 2 ACL injuries one after another which has hampered his playing time at the gunners.

Everton are keen to sign a focal point in their attack following the sale or Romelu Lukaku and only have Sandro Ramirez and Wayne Rooney as experienced forwards.

Giroud wants to see how much playing time he will receive at Arsenal this season before deciding on his future although according to reports, Arsenal would be willing to sell both players.

Everton are being linked with a £30m move for Arsenal striker Danny Welbeck if they can’t do a deal for Olivier Giroud according to the Mirror.

The 26 year old Arsenal forward has suffered a torrid time with injuries having suffered 2 ACL injuries one after another which has hampered his playing time at the gunners.

Everton are keen to sign a focal point in their attack following the sale or Romelu Lukaku and only have Sandro Ramirez and Wayne Rooney as experienced forwards.

Giroud wants to see how much playing time he will receive at Arsenal this season before deciding on his future although according to reports, Arsenal would be willing to sell both players.
